name: Legacy
description: Our Kids First is a non-profit organization committed to providing academic, social, and cultural enrichment to young people by educating and preparing them to be successful, independent and responsible members and leaders of society. OKF has continued to serve the community through a variety of educational programs, such as an after school program, summer day camp, college tours, and career development workshops. fullDescription: Our Kids First is a non-profit organization committed to providing academic, social, and cultural enrichment to young people by educating and preparing them to be successful, independent and responsible members and leaders of society. OKF has continued to serve the community through a variety of educational programs, such as an after school program, summer day camp, college tours, and career development workshops. The program name in itself describes our sole purpose for existence--to focus on t
whatTheyOffer: A peer support program serving caregivers and parents of children and transitional-age youth involved in child-serving systems such as foster care, mental health, juvenile justice, and special education. Services include: Case Management Assistance with systems navigation (Special Education, Behavioral Health, Child Welfare, Juvenile Justice) Advocacy Support groups and educational and life skills workshops Parenting classes Referrals to health and community resources"
